[[Image:Logo_STB_Wiki.png|thumb|right|250px|STB logo]]
'''Sociedade de Tolkien Brasileira''' (Brazilian: '''Brazilian Tolkien Society'''), abbreviated STB or BTS, is a Tolkien Society in Brazil. It was founded on [[1999]] by Daniel Cossi.<ref>[http://cultura.estadao.com.br/noticias/cinema,fa-funda-sociedade-para-discutir-senhor-dos-aneis,20011211p2899 Fã funda sociedade para discutir Senhor dos Anéis]</ref>

Daniel Cossi in 2001  "Annexed the Society to the company of which he is a partner, investing $ 275,000" . Since then, the Brazilian Tolkien Society has been acting as a consultant for products related to Peter Jackson movies.<ref>[http://www.terra.com.br/istoegente/125/reportagem/senhor_aneis_ouro.htm Interview with the founder]</ref>
